title: Junai Strip
sinopse:
Yuuko is in her third year in junior high. She is a glasses wearing...four-eyed nerd. She's suddenly getting tutoring from perfect Ryuunosuke-kun, but that is not the only thing that Yuuko is getting tutoring for... Yuuko's dangerous summer hoilday is about to begin!

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot: Doku no Hana
